#summary Description of the Joy programming language.
#labels Glossary

= Joy =

Joy is a [Functional functional] dynamic [StackLanguages stack-based] programming language designed by [http://www.latrobe.edu.au/philosophy/phimvt/index.html Manfred von Thun]. Joy was the primary inspiration for the Cat language.
